title: Astar Network | polkadot L2 partnership
body:
> by 0x07356b0edf9b934330f41952b09d076c3810c608 (Bet)

Should the following Tier 6: up to $240,000 USD, 6 months vesting (1 month cliff) grant in the Platform Contributor category be approved?

## Abstract

Funding to host monthly hackathons for DCL and ASTAR communities.

The hackathons will be similar to keep networks ICO events. https://blog.keep.network/playing-for-keeps-kicks-off-with-first-three-judges-announced-5eb9a10262e0

Where a few trusted dcl/astar community judges are selected to handpick the most quality community created content.


## Grant size

200,000 USD

## Beneficiary address

0x07356b0edf9b934330f41952b09d076c3810c608

## Description

Astar Network is likely to be one of the first polkadot parachains.

They support EVM, NFTs, smart contracts, dapps, L2 and meta transactions.
I have been educating their community about the possibilities of a DCL integration and they love the idea.

Hackathon prizes will be given for Dapp integrations, L2 bridges, wearable designs, social media promotions, documentation, github work, translations, metas, memes and more!

Here is the initial proposal and conceptual designs:
https://forum.astar.network/t/decentraland-events/2004
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJK_nyyWAjA


## Specification

Month 1:
I have about 10 people so far that have said they want to help from both projects.
So I will get them all in a github repository and start hacking away at an event to explain what is going on

Month 2 (After initial event):
We will be active in github, discord and telegram helping users to market/promote our hackathon.

Month 3:
Hackathon starts

Month 4:
Another hackathon

Month 5:
Final hackathon


## Personnel

Astar:
@butter
@theo ambassador
@tiger marketing
@maarten dapps
@sota and @MS are lead astar devs

DCL:
@patmacs
@Denis
@butter#4840 message him on discord if you want to be involved or have any questions.

Also I work with SFXDX


## Roadmap and milestones

The whole event should take 5 months to complete from approval.

All information:
Discord: https://discord.gg/f976QStQ
Github: https://github.com/ERC20s/ASTAR
Telegram: https://t.me/unofficialASTAR

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=0af89900-410c-11ec-be0c-afec86cba5e5)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
